rx.internal.operators

Class OperatorParallelMerge

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.internal.operators.OperatorParallelMerge

  • public final class OperatorParallelMerge
extends java.lang.Object
    Combines multiple Observables into a smaller number of Observables, to facilitate parallelism.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Observable<Observable<T>> parallelMerge(Observable<Observable<T>> source, int parallelObservables)
      Recombines multiple Observables into a smaller number of Observables, to facilitate parallelism.
      static <T> Observable<Observable<T>> parallelMerge(Observable<Observable<T>> source, int parallelObservables, Scheduler scheduler)
      Recombines multiple Observables into a smaller number of Observables on a particular Scheduler, to facilitate parallelism.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • parallelMerge

        public static <T> Observable<Observable<T>> parallelMerge(Observable<Observable<T>> source,
                                                          int parallelObservables)
        Recombines multiple Observables into a smaller number of Observables, to facilitate parallelism.
        Parameters:
        source - the source Observable that emits the Observables to recombine
        parallelObservables - the number of Observables you want the source sequence of Observables to be recombined into
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits no more than parallelObservables Observables, the set of which emits the same set of items emitted by the sequence of Observables emitted by source

      • parallelMerge

        public static <T> Observable<Observable<T>> parallelMerge(Observable<Observable<T>> source,
                                                          int parallelObservables,
                                                          Scheduler scheduler)
        Recombines multiple Observables into a smaller number of Observables on a particular Scheduler, to facilitate parallelism.
        Parameters:
        source - the source Observable that emits the Observables to recombine
        parallelObservables - the number of Observables you want the source sequence of Observables to be recombined into
        scheduler - the Scheduler to do the work on
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits no more than parallelObservables Observables, the set of which emits the same set of items emitted by the sequence of Observables emitted by source
